name: Sinful
description:
-Controls-

Move - WASD
Interact - SPACE
Sin info - E
Go to sleep - Q
Mute music - M

-How to play-

Interact with the people and buildings in the game and max out all the sins.
Use your tablet (Press Q) to read about the sins.
When you're ready, go to sleep (you'll get your last sin here) and see what awaits you.
